citeinfo.title: Rhode Island Geographic Information System (RIGIS) Data Distribution System

descript.abstract: Representative political boundary lines for the State of Rhode Island. Includes physical shoreline features for bay and coastal waters.
descript.purpose: General mapping, graphic display and GIS analysis of the State of Rhode Island political boundary.

procstep.procdesc: Dissolved the Municipal Boundaries (1997) dataset available from RIGIS based upon its LAND attribute field.
